extension.name: NTeam
extension.author: Nitish Gundherva
extension.description: A module to display the team members.
extension.copyright: This module is released under the GNU/GPL License

field.name: style-type
field.label: Display Style
field.description: Choose the style

field.name: imageno
field.label: No of images in a row
field.description: Fill 0 for max. no of images per row

field.name: image-width
field.label: Image Width (px)
field.description: Width of the images

field.name: image-height
field.label: Image Height (px)
field.description: Height of the images

field.name: image-method
field.label: Resize Method
field.description: Choose the method using which images will be resized

field.name: border-width
field.label: Border Width (px)
field.description: Width of the border

field.name: border-color
field.label: Border Color
field.description: Color of the border

field.name: title-size
field.label: Title Font Size (px)
field.description: Font size of the title

field.name: field1-size
field.label: Field 1 Font Size (px)
field.description: Font size of the field 1

field.name: field2-size
field.label: Field 2 Font Size (px))
field.description: Font size of the field 2

field.name: link-tab
field.label: Open links in
field.description: Choose whether the links should open in new tab or same window

field.name: name_1
field.label: Name
field.description: Team member's name

field.name: field1_1
field.label: Field 1
field.description: Any information can be filled here

field.name: field2_1
field.label: Field 2
field.description: Any information can be filled here

field.name: link_1
field.label: Social Profile Link
